## Project Summary
Control Room DSR Management System - Complete Flask web application for managing Daily Status Reports across 28 districts. Features include user authentication, 16 different report forms, admin dashboard, file upload functionality, and Excel export capabilities.

## Execution Guidelines
- Flask web application for 28 districts + control room
- 16 different report forms with dynamic fields  
- Admin and district user authentication
- Date-wise DSR generation and Excel export
- File upload functionality
- SQLite database integration
- Bootstrap responsive UI
